resources.string: FCL requires storage permission to manage and read game files. FCL is fully open-source on GitHub, so please rest assured about your data security. The permission is solely for the game to operate properly and poses no security risks.
No storage permission, please grant Fold Craft Launcher the permission.
You have chosen "Never Allow" Please manually grant storage permissions in settings.
FCL requires permission to post notifications to prevent issues with normal game installation or startup.
Cannot get EULA, please check the network.

Fold Craft Launcher is an Android Minecraft Launcher, allows user to launch Minecraft: Java Edition on Android device.

Fold Craft Launcher is developed by FCL-Team.

Fold Craft Launcher's most features are modified based on HMCLCore.

The app borrows and quotes some codes of PojavLauncher and Boat, so if you are going to distribute this app, please follow GPL-v3 License.
Please provide enough account info first!

Under normal circumstances, the game username can only contain English characters, numbers and underscores, and the length cannot exceed 16 characters.
Some legitimate usernames: Tungsten, Tungsten_123;
Some illegal usernames: Exam ple, Exam-a_%%%, Tungsten_hello_world_hello_world.
If you believe that there is a corresponding mod or plugin on the server side to remove this restriction, you can ignore this warning.
Credential has expired, you must delete your account and re-login.
There are no characters linked to this account.
Unable to contact authentication servers, your Internet connection may be down.
Unable to connect to the authentication server. Please check your network and make sure you entered the correct URL.
Cannot access authentication server. You can log in offline or try to re-login.
Invalid server response, the authentication server may not be working.
Incorrect password or rate limited, please try again later.
Your account needs to be migrated to a Microsoft account. If you already did, you should re-login to your migrated Microsoft account instead.
Unable to download authlib-injector. Please check your network, or try switching to a different download mirror.
The character has already been deleted.
An SSL error occurred while connecting to the server.
You have logged in to the wrong account.
Since you are not yet 18 years old, an adult must add you to a family in order for you to play Minecraft.
Xbox Live is not available in your current country/region.
Your Microsoft account does not have a linked Xbox account yet. Please create one before continuing.
Your account may have been banned by Xbox Live.\nYou can click on "Ban Query" above for more details.
Please log in using your account(like phone number) and password on the Microsoft account login page. Please do not use a verification code to log in.
Your account does not own the Minecraft Java Edition.\nThe game profile may not have been created.
Please check if the age indicated in your account settings is at least 18 years old. If not and you believe this is an error, you can go to official website to change it.
Microsoft account authorization is now completed.
Please click on the "Login" button, a piece of code will be automatically copied later, enter the code in the opened browser to finish the login process.

Because the account authorization is invalid, you need to re-add your Microsoft account\nPlease click on the "OK" button, a piece of code will be automatically copied later, enter the code in the opened browser to finish the login process.
You need to create a character with the same name as your offline account on your skin provider website. Your skin will then be your uploaded skin to that site.
This announcement is an important announcement. Please confirm that you have read this announcement before hiding it. Do you want to continue hiding it?
Index files of downloaded assets were corrupted.
Are you sure you want to permanently remove it? This action cannot be undone!
Join our community to get latest version, report bugs, etc. Please follow the community rules if you join.
Are you sure to delete this controller?
The current controller already exist. Downloading will overwrite the local controller. Are you sure to continue?
Controller: %s is an outdated controller, it may produce some unknown bugs, but we still support it, do you want to migrate it to a new version?
Controller: %s is an incompatible controller, it may be caused by the launcher version being too low or the controller version being too low, please check.

Please join the QQ group first, then click "Share" to share the controller and its information to the administrator and wait for review. Please contact the administrator to tell him the category of your controller.
Up to 16 screenshots can be uploaded!
The controller already exist, please change the name!
File not found on the remote server: %s
Unable to fetch version list. Please retry.
Please add or select a view group first!
Are you sure to delete this button?
Are you sure to delete this direction controller?
Cannot verify the integrity of the downloaded files.
Unable to establish SSL connection due to missing SSL certificates in current Java installation.

The game crashed due to a block.

You can try removing this block using MCEdit or delete that mod that added it.

Block Type: %1$s
Location: %2$s
The game crashed due to mod %1$s.\n\nYou can try deleting or updating it.
The game crashed because a mod %1$s cannot parse its config file %2$s.
The game crashed because you manually triggered it.\n\nSo, you probably know why.

The game cannot launch due to duplicate mods: %1$s.

%2$s

Each mod can only be installed once, please delete the duplicate mod and try again.

The game crashed due to an entity.

You can try removing this entity using MCEdit or delete that mod that added it.

Block Type: %1$s
Location: %2$s

The current game cannot continue to run because some Mod injection failed.\nThis generally means that the Mod has a bug or is incompatible with the current environment.\nYou can check the log to find the error module.
Because the current game has repeatedly installed multiple identical Mods, each Mod can only appear once. Please delete the duplicate Mods and then restart the game.

Forge may have provided error information.
You can view the log and make corresponding processing according to the log information in the error report.
If you do not see the error message, you can view the error report to understand how the error occurred.
%1$s
The current game cannot continue to run because of some Mod problems.\nYou can check the log to find the error module.
The current game cannot continue to run because of a problem with the Mod configuration file.\nYou can check the log to find the error module and its configuration file.

Forge may have provided error information.\nYou can view the log and make corresponding processing according to the log information in the error report.\nIf you do not see the error message, you can view the error report to understand how the error occurred.
The current game cannot continue to run due to an inappropriate version of the Java virtual machine.\nThe version needs java 11.

The current game cannot continue to run because of Mod file name problems.\nMod file names should use only upper and lower case letters (Aa~Zz), numbers (0~9), horizontal lines (-), underscores (_), and dots (.) in full half-angle English.\nPlease go to the Mod folder and add all non-compliant Mod file names with one of the above compliant characters.
The current game cannot continue due to an incomplete installation of Forge.\nPlease uninstall and reinstall Forge.
Fabric 0.12 or above are incompatible with currently installed mods. You need to downgrade it to 0.11.7.
The game crashed because file %1$s already exists.\n\nYou can try backing up and delete that file, then relaunch the game.
The game crashed because it did not pass the integrity checks.\n\nIf you modified the Minecraft jar, you will need to rollback the changes, or redownload the game.
The game crashed due to some mods, shader packs, and resource packs.\n\nPlease disable the mods/shaderpacks/resource packs you are using and then try again.
The game crashed due to some mods.\nIf you know: %1$s, you can delete the mod and try again.
The current game crashes because OptiFine is incompatible with the current version of Forge.

The current game cannot continue to run because the Mod file has been decompressed.\nPlease put the entire Mod file directly into the Mod folder!\nIf unzipping will cause errors in the game, please delete the unzipped Mod in the Mod folder, and then start the game.
The current game cannot be found because Forge is not installed completely.\nYou can try to uninstall Forge and reinstall it.
The current game cannot continue to run because both OptiFine and Shaders Mod are installed.\nBecause OptiFine has integrated Shaders Mod\'s functions, just remove Shaders Mod.
The current game cannot continue to run because you have installed too many Mods, which exceeds the ID limit of the game.\nPlease try installing JEID, or delete some large Mods.

The current game cannot continue to run due to some problems with Night Config.\nYou can try to install the Night Config Fixes mod, which may help you this problem.\nFor more information, visit the mod\'s Github repository.
The current game may not continue to run because of OptiFine.\nThis problem only occurs in a specific version of OptiFine. You can try changing the version of OptiFine.
The game crashed because the current memory allocation exceeds the limit of the 32-bit Java VM.
The game crashed due to mod %1$s (%2$s).\n\nYou can try deleting or updating it.
The game crashed due to mod %1$s.\n\nYou can try deleting or updating it.

The current game cannot continue to run due to a duplicate installation of Forge. This is a known issue.\nIt is recommended to upload the log feedback to Github so that we can find more clues and fix this question.\nCurrently you can uninstall Forge and reinstall it.
The current game cannot continue to run due to repeated installation of OptiFine. \nPlease delete OptiFine under the Mod folder or uninstall OptiFine that is automatically installed.
The game crashed due to too much memory allocated.
The game crashed due to mod %1$s.\n\nYou may update or delete the mod and then try again.

The game crashed due to mod resolution failure.

Fabric provided the following details:
%1$s

The game crashed due to mod resolution failure.

Forge provided the following details:
%1$s

The game crashed because the mod version is not compatible.

%1$s requires %2$s.

You need to upgrade or downgrade %3$s before continuing.
The game crashed because of conflicting mods.\n\n%1$s is incompatible with %2$s.

The game crashed because some dependency mods are not installed.

%1$s requires mod: %2$s.

This means that you have to download and install %2$s first to continue playing.

The game crashed because a mod is incompatible with the current Minecraft version.

%1$s requires Minecraft version %2$s.

If you want to play with this version of the mod installed, you should change the instance version.
Otherwise, you should install a version that is compatible with this Minecraft version.
The game crashed because your current Forge version is not compatible with your Java installation, please try updating Forge.

The game cannot run because of incomplete code.

Your game instance is missing %1$s, this might be due to a mod missing, an incompatible mod installed, or some files might be corrupted.

You may need to reinstall the game and all mods or ask someone for help.

The game cannot run because of incomplete code.

Your game instance might be missing a mod, installed an incompatible mod, or some files might be corrupted.

You may need to reinstall the game and all mods or ask someone for help.
The game crashed because OpenGL is not supported by your renderer.

The game crashed because it ran out of memory.

This may be because there is not enough memory available, or too many mods installed. You can try fixing it by increasing the allocated memory under the game settings.

If you still encounter these problems, well, you may need a better device.
The game crashed because you are using a resource pack whose texture resolution was too high.\n\nYou should switch to a resource pack with lower resolution.
The current game crashed because processing of -javaagent failed.\nIf you add relevant parameters to the Java virtual machine parameters, please check whether they are legal and correct.

The crash reason is unknown.

There are some keywords that might contain some Mod IDs. You can search them online to figure out the issue yourself.

%s
We are not able to figure out why the game crashed, please refer to the game logs.\n\nWhen asking someone else for help, please share the full game log and related crash report file with them!
Unable to launch Minecraft due to missing libraries: %1$s.
You should send the full crash log file instead of taking a screenshot
Fill the required input box first.
The input must be a number.
The input must be a valid URL.
Are you sure you want to switch %s from version %s to %s?
We are unable to download some of the required files.
Unable to identify the provided file. If you are installing a mod, go to the Mods page.
The downloaded files are corrupted. You can try to fix this issue by switching to another download mirror.
Cannot install both Fabric, OptiFine, and Forge on Minecraft 1.13 or above.
For Minecraft version 1.17.1 or lower, Forge only supports OptiFine H1 Pre2 or newer. You can install them under the snapshot versions tab.
This library requires the game version %s, but the installed one is %s.
Version %s is not compatible with the current game version. Click here to replace it with another version or delete it.

Warning: Fabric API is a mod, and will be installed into the mod directory of the game instance. Please do not change the working directory of the game, or the Fabric API will not work. If you do want to change these settings, you should reinstall it.
This instance already exists. Please use another name.
Jar Executor crash reason analyse is not supported now.
You are using a deprecated Java version, are you sure you want to continue?
Waiting for the game to launch
Are you sure to delete this view group?
Please fill the view group name first
Are you sure to force exit?
Mouse Sensitivity(When the cursor is displayed)
Describe your modpack, including an introduction and probably some changelog. Markdown and images from URL are currently supported.
Enter a name for this modpack.
CurseForge, Modrinth, MultiMC, and MCBBS modpacks are currently supported.
Invalid modpack, you can try to redownload it.
Modpack type mismatched, the current instance is a %s type, but the provided one is %s type.
Unable to identify this modpack. We currently only support Curse, Modrinth, MultiMC, and MCBBS modpacks.
You are going to install modpack:
Unable to download dependencies, you can try to continue downloading by launching this game instance.
Unable to download dependencies from CurseForge, please try again or use a proxy connection.
Some dependencies are no longer available, please try to install a newer version of the modpack.

The modpack is manually packaged by the publisher, which may already contain a launcher. It is recommended to try to decompress and run the game with its own launcher. FCL can still import it, with no guarantee of its usability, still continue?
Can be imported by FCL, HMCL and MultiMC
Can be imported by FCL, HMCL and MultiMC
Allows server owner to update the game instance remotely
Invalid modpack manifest, please refer to the server modpack maker to fix this issue.
Some basic settings for the modpack.
Select files you wanted to add to the modpack.
Choose the modpack type you wanted to export as.
Force updating the modpack to the latest version (you\'ll need a file-hosting service)

Before creating a modpack, please make sure the game launches, and it is a release version instead of a snapshot version.\n\nKeep in mind that you are not allowed to add mods and resource packs that are explicitly said not to be distributed or put in a modpack.
This dependency existed before. However, it doesn\'t exist now. Try using another download source.
No mods need to be updated
Unable to download some of the files.
built-in pre-mod (already packaged in the mod file by the author, no need to download separately)
optional pre-mod (if the game is missing, but mod functionality may be missing)
required pre-mod (must be downloaded separately, missing may cause the game to fail to launch)
precursor library (must be downloaded separately, missing may cause the game to fail to launch)
built-in pre-mod (already packaged in the mod file by the author, no need to download separately)
incompatible mod (installing both the mod and the mod being downloaded will cause the game to fail to launch)
Broken pre-mod (This premod used to exist on the mod repository, but is now deleted.) Try a different download source.
You must install a mod loader (Fabric, Forge or LiteLoader) first to manage your mods!
Updating mods in a modpack can lead to irreparable results, possibly corrupting the modpack so that it cannot start. Are you sure you want to update?
This name already exists, please use a different name.
Search queries support both Chinese and English
Isolated (.minecraft/versions/<instance name>/, except for assets and libraries)
Join automatically after launching the game.
Allow zink to use System Vulkan driver
Force the renderer to run on the big core(Pojav backend)
%1$.1f GB Minimum / %2$.1f GB Allocated (%3$.1f GB Available)
Are you sure to delete this style?
Failed to download latest version, please retry or download it from official website.
No instances, please install one before launch.
The duplicated instance will have a copy of all the files of this instance, with an isolated game directory and settings.
Are you sure you want to permanently remove the version %s? This action cannot be undone!
Since this instance is stored in an isolated directory, deleting it will also delete its saves and other data. Do you still want to delete instance %s?
Only Minecraft 1.13 or newer supports datapacks.
Select a directory for this exported world
Select the save archive you want to import

Before installation, you should understand that most modpacks are designed for PC, so there is a high probability that you will encounter crashes or other issues when trying to launch. This is often not a problem that can be solved at the launcher level. Therefore, you need to understand the relevant knowledge and try to solve the problem yourself or seek help from others (do not ask the launcher developer!).
If you find the color of the text on the right side is not clear, you can click here, then click \"Launcher Settings\", and select \"Secondary Theme Color\"
Long press here to share the game log (latest_game.log).
The current GPU is Adreno, it is not recommended to enable this option.
You can get plugins through the following ways.
You can get Java through the following ways.
Physics mod (%s) currently in use has not been patched(replace libPhysXJniBindings_64.so form Linux x86_64 to Android arm64/x86_64), it will cause crash.
MCEF mod (%s) cannot work on Android. It is usually used as a dependency of WebDisplays/In-game Browser.
Valkyrien Skies/Valkyrien Warfare mod (%s) cannot work directly in single player mode. You must use a server, otherwise it will crash the game.
Yes Steve Model mod (%s) 2.2.2+ cannot work on Android.
IMBlocker/In-GameIME (%s) is not for Android. It must make the game crash.
FFmpeg plugin is needed for Replay (%s). It seems that you haven\'t installed it yet. You can download from Google Play Store or here( %s or %s ) (Long press to copy).
BorderlessWindow (%s) is not for Android. It must make the game crash.
Axiom (%s) currently in use has not been patched, it will cause crash.

The currently used GL4ES renderer may not support the mods Sodium/Embeddium (%s). Continuing to launch could cause the game to crash. It is recommended to download and use the MobileGlues renderer instead (https://github.com/MobileGL-Dev/MobileGlues-release/releases).
Only supports importing the tar.xz file.
It has been detected that the Java you imported may not be intended for use on the current device. Launching with it may cause the program to crash. Do you wish to continue with the import?
Failed to automatically redirect to the browser. The link has been copied automatically. Please manually open the browser and paste it in.
The menu view is hidden. Press the volume key to open the menu.

The version you have currently selected has enabled per-instance settings, so the renderer selected here cannot be applied to the current version. Suggest long pressing the "Launch" button to select the renderer.
Please select a link to download (it will open in your browser).
The current renderer %s does not support this game version. Continuing to use it may cause rendering errors or game crashes! Do you want to continue?
